summary: Implemented a visible, centered hamburger menu across all pages that collapses/expands the navbar when clicked. Updated CSS to make hamburger menu always visible and centered after the banner title section. Navbar starts collapsed by default and expands when hamburger is clicked. Added hamburger menu button and JavaScript functionality to all HTML pages (index, leader, entrepreneur, creator, tutor, contact, projects, skills, privacypolicy, terms-conditions) for consistency. About dropdown works properly with click-to-toggle on mobile and hover on desktop.
current_status: Hamburger menu implementation complete across all pages. Menu is visible, centered, and functional. Navbar collapses/expands on click. All pages have consistent navigation with working dropdown menus.
